title: Landscape
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Eugène Stanislas Alexandre Bléry [1805-1887], Paris, France. Unidentified collector [1]. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ,  by June 12, 1974 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.

Notes:
[1]. The drawing is stamped with an unidentified collector's mark (initials inside purple, double-lined rectangle), recto, lower right.
[2]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.

creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
